title: You're Special: a 'by children, for children' book
description: You’re Special is a cute little book encouraging children that they’re special, beautiful, delightful and more... featuring characters such an animated maze who says ‘you’re amazing’, and others who totally ‘rock’. You’re Special and its companions, You’re Wonderful and You’re a Star are full of fun and humour and these inspiring books are saying a cheery hello, encouraging little ones that they are indeed special, wonderful and more. 'by children, for children'
author: Leitaya Macale
